scripts.build:ledger-bridge: cd src/ledger-bridge && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build:static: mkdir -p hosting/static.moonlet.xyz && touch hosting/static.moonlet.xyz/index.html && npm run build:ledger-bridge && cp -r src/email hosting/static.moonlet.xyz/
scripts.deploy:website: npm run scrape:website && firebase deploy --only hosting:website
scripts.deploy:static: npm run build:static && firebase deploy --only hosting:static && firebase deploy --only hosting:legacy
scripts.deploy:api: mkdir -p hosting/api.moonlet.xyz && touch hosting/api.moonlet.xyz/index.html && firebase deploy --only functions && firebase deploy --only hosting:api
